title: In the stock SMS program my character counter counts the same character as a different value, help?
content: The quickest way to show the problem is to type a message that approaches the 1st text limit. Once remaining characters are visible (3 remaining in this example) go to any "space" in the text and delete it and re-type it. Repeat repeatedly. One would expect, characters left count to go from 3 to 4 and back to 3. However, I notice about a 10% fail rate of counting the character correctly. 3 to 4 to 3 to 4 to 3 to 8 to 3 to 4. This leads to text messages that register as shorter/longer than actually displaying. This happens pretty reliably.
